metadata.title: CVE-2024-6612 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: CSP violations generated links in the console tab of the developer tools,pointing to the violating resource. This caused a DNS prefetch which leakedthat a CSP violation happened. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 128 andThunderbird < 128.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
